name: Tiny Hands Adventure
description: Join young t-rex Borti on his quest to find the best replacement for his tiny hands and arms. Explore several unknown worlds, find all the collectables and face bosses that have what you want. The adventure starts now!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.2 GHz dual-core recommended Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU Recommended Storage: 2500 MB available space
